home.title: Welcome to the DOME Issuer for LEAR Credentials
home.intro-main: This site is intended for Legal Representatives of companies who want to issue one or more LEAR Credentials to one or more employees of the company. A LEAR Credential is a type of Verifiable Credential which enables an employee, nominated by a legal representative, to act on behalf of an organisation with restricted power with respect to third-parties.
home.intro-first: The issuer of the LEAR Credential must be a legal representative of the company. The legal representative will sign the LEAR Credential with an eIDAS digital certificate, which can be either a personal one or a certificate of representation.
home.intro-second: The receiver of the LEARC redential (both the subject and holder of the credential) can be any employee (or contractor) of the company. The legal representative will delegate a restricted set of power to that person. Those restricted power are included inside the credential and can be verified by any Relying party to whom the holder presents the LEAR Credential.
home.legal-first: You must be a legal representative of the company, to be able to delegate the restricted power required for DOME.
home.legal-second: You need an eIDAS certificate to be able to use the system. In additionyou will have to register your company email.
home.legal-third: Note: if you are reading this in your mobile, most probably the button will not work, unless you have installed your eIDAS certificate in the mobile. You typically need to use a PC, with the certificate installed in the browser.
home.obtain-wallet-intro: You need a wallet to store your LEAR Credentials and present them to Relaying parties like DOME Marketplace.
home.obtain-wallet-detail: DOME provides a simple wallet enough for authenticating to the DOME Marketplace and performing all needed processes.

error.not_found: The requested resource was not found.
error.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
error.forbidden: You do not have permission to access this resource.
error.internal_server: An error occurred on the server. Please try again later.
error.one_power_min: There must be at least one power selected, and each power must have at least one action selected.
error.unknown_error: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.

policy.title: Access Denied
policy.message: You do not have the required power to access.

credentialOffer.invalid-url: Unexpected error: invalid URL, can't get credential offer.
credentialOffer.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later or contact your company's Legal Representative to get a new credential.
credentialOffer.not-found: This credential offer is invalid. It may have already been downloaded, expired, or replaced by a new one. If you received a new offer, please check your email. If it has expired or you cannot find a valid offer, contact your company's Legal Representative to request a new one.
credentialOffer.conflict: The credential offer is invalid. It may have already been downloaded or replaced by a new one. If you received a new offer, please check your email.

serverMailError.title: Mail server error
serverMailError.message: There was an error with the mail server. Please try again later to send a send reminder, if problem persist contact support team.

form.ip: Invalid IP address. Please enter a valid IPv4 or IPv6 address.
form.only_letters_and_numbers: Only letters and numbers are allowed
form.only_letters_numbers_hyphens: Only letters, numbers and hyphens are allowed

email.invalid: Invalid email. It may contain an invalid character or a character in an incorrect position.
email.local_part_max: The local part of the email can't exceed 64 characters.
email.domain_part_max: The domain part of the email can't exceed 189 characters.
email.main_domain_part_min: The portion of the domain between '@' and the last '.' must be at least 2 characters long.
email.top_level_domain_part_min: The portion of the domain after the last '.' must be at least 2 characters long.

form.org_id_startsWithVAT: Enter the id without VAT nor the country prefix
form.no_key: You need to generate a key to submit.
form.no_power: You need to add at least one power
form.no_function: Each power must have at least one selected function
